CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Default_Greeting_Type__c,"Personal Greeting"), DonorApi__Personal_Greeting__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Default_Greeting_Type__c,"Personal Recognition Name"), DonorApi__Personal_Recognition_Name__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Default_Greeting_Type__c,"Formal Greeting"), DonorApi__Formal_Greeting__c,DonorApi__Personal_Greeting__c)))
CustomField.label: Default Greeting
